mil3.3.10:1.1: “Venerable Nāgasena, what is the distinguishing characteristic of perception?”
mil3.3.10:1.2: “Perceiving, your majesty, is the distinguishing characteristic of perception.
mil3.3.10:1.4: One perceives blue, yellow, red, white, and crimson.
mil3.3.10:1.5: Thus, your majesty, perceiving is the distinguishing characteristic of perception.”
mil3.3.10:2.2: “Just as, your majesty, a king’s storekeeper, having entered the warehouse and seen the forms of the king’s goods there, perceives blue, yellow, red, white, and crimson.
mil3.3.10:2.3: Thus, your majesty, perceiving is the distinguishing characteristic of perception.”
mil3.3.10:4.1: Distinguishing Characteristic of Perception Question tenth
